title: Christina Ricci
summary: Christina Ricci (/ˈriːtʃi/; born February 12, 1980)[1]  is an American actress. She is known for playing unconventional characters with a dark edge.[2] Ricci is the recipient of several accolades, including a National Board of Review Award for Best Supporting Actress and a Satellite Award for Best Actress, as well as Golden Globe, Primetime Emmy, Screen Actors Guild, and Independent Spirit Award nominations.
